channel.title: Need help with my quest plz help [pi]
channel.description:
i made a quest and everything is done but i only need to make if players have an item in their inventory then the can talk to the npc if they dont have that item they cant talk to the npc.
skype: jake.brett6

item.title: Need help with my quest plz help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Palastinescape Palastinescape
item.description:
@Palastinescape wrote:

This dident work help?

if (playerHasItem(1,1)) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(256, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("you need to have this item") }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my quest plz help [pi]

//. . . talk to npc
} else {
